title: President Donald J. Trump is Establishing America’s Space Force – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Infrastructure & Technology	

Issued on:
February 19, 2019
Our destiny, beyond the Earth, is not only a matter of national identity, but a matter of national security.
						President Donald J. Trump					ESTABLISHING THE SPACE FORCE: President Donald J. Trump’s Space Policy Directive-4 is a bold, strategic step toward guaranteeing American space dominance that sets the framework for establishing the United States Space Force.A VITAL NATIONAL INTEREST: Our use of space is necessary to keep our country safe, protect lives, and support our way of life.LEADING IN A NEW WARFIGHTING DOMAIN: President Trump knows warfare is changing—space is now a warfighting domain just like the air, land and sea.
